title: Chains with the largest share of the U.S. burger restaurant market as of June 2014
yAxis: Share of the burger restaurant market
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of the burger restaurant market for 4 number of Burger Restaurant Chainss.
The Share of the burger restaurant market is highest at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and lowest at Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.
There is a difference of 26.1 between the maximum Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and minimum Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Burger Restaurant Chains in the x axis and Share of the burger restaurant market in the y axis.
Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's has the highest Share of the burger restaurant market and Sonic Drive-Ins has the lowest Share of the burger restaurant market.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of the burger restaurant market for 4 number of Burger Restaurant Chainss.
The Share of the burger restaurant market is highest at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and lowest at Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.
There is a difference of 26.1 between the maximum Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and minimum Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Burger Restaurant Chains, and Share of the burger restaurant market in each Burger Restaurant Chains on the y axis.
The Share of the burger restaurant market is highest at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and lowest at Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.
Second maximum Share of the burger restaurant market is found at Burger Restaurant Chains Burger King.
The maximum Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's has got 4.18 times higher Share of the burger restaurant market than the minimum Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.
Share of the burger restaurant market at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's is 34.3 , second place is Burger King at 15.4, and thirdly is Wendy's at 13.9.
The Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's tends to be 1.91 percent higher than average.
The Share of the burger restaurant market is 71.8 if we add up values of all Burger Restaurant Chainss.
